collection_body.paragraph_1: The WEC Ocala Spring 2026 Series opens just after the Winter Spectacular, bringing riders from across the country to the well-kept arenas at the World Equestrian Center. Each week of Regional Hunter and Level 2 Jumper competition runs with the efficient rhythm the venue is known for, balancing sport and comfort for both horses and crews.
